mapper.select: select u.id,u.username,u.login_name, r.id as roleId,r.name as roleName, p.id as permissionId,p.name as permissionName,p.code as permissionCode from t_sys_user u left join t_sys_user_role ur on u.id=ur.user_id left join t_sys_role r on r.id=ur.role_id left join t_sys_role_permission rp on rp.role_id=ur.role_id left join t_sys_permission p on p.id=rp.permission_id where u.id=#{userId} ORDER BY U.username,r.name,p.name;
